trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de criação num designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um designer visual, quando muda de origem para a vista de estrutura, o código de origem do markup que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo é analisado e uma versão de tempo de criação do controlo é criada na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando voltar a mudar para vista de origem, o controlo de tempo de criação é transferido para o código de origem do markup e editá-lo na marcação de página Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the GridViewDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe GridViewDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade devolve um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que contém, geralmente, um objeto que é derivado de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>propriedade devolve uma coleção de esquemas para apresentação de formatação de **formatação automática** caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the top-level <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> templates.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>propriedade devolve um conjunto de grupos de modelo para os campos de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo e de nível superior <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>modelos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>propriedade devolve sempre `true`, que indica que o estruturador cria uma cópia temporária do associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>para gerar a marcação de momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods of the GridViewDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Os métodos da classe GridViewDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.DataBind%2A>método vincula associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo a uma origem de dados do momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.DataBind%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> at design time.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método devolve a marcação que é utilizada para compor associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>método prepara o estruturador para ver, editar e estruturar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> associados</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnClick%2A>método é chamado quando uma região da vista de tempo de criação de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> changes.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>método é chamado quando o esquema da origem de dados de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>alterações.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove or add properties or to shadow properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método é utilizado para remover ou adicionar propriedades ou às propriedades de sombra de volumes de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Design-time editable regions are not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> methods have no functionality.
trans-unit.target: Tempo de criação de regiões editáveis não são suportadas no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A>métodos não ter nenhuma funcionalidade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner>classe quando cria associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo ou uma cópia desse controlo na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de lista de ação de estruturador para neste estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado neste estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de esquemas de formatação predefinidas para apresentar o **formatação automática** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>objeto é preenchido a partir de um membro com codificação XML de uma classe interna.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> that contains the predefined schemes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Vincula o controlo associado à origem de dados do momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The DataBind method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to the design-time data source and assigns a unique value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DesignerRegionAttributeName> field of each cell of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: O método DataBind vincula associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo para a origem de dados de tempo de criação e atribui um valor exclusivo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DesignerRegionAttributeName>campo de cada célula do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>composição de tempo de criação do controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DesignerRegionAttributeName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `dataBoundControl` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo que está associado a este designer ou uma cópia desse controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> para vincular a origem de dados do momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é utilizada para compor o controlo associado no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method does the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml faz o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property of the control to `true`, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> property is empty.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>propriedade do controlo para `true`, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>propriedade está vazia.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of the control to `null`, if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Define o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>propriedade do controlo para `null`, se não é possível obter o esquema da origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to be called.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>objeto para forçar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>método a chamar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Calls the base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método base para gerar o markup.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém a marcação para compor o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> no momento da concepção.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é utilizada para compor o controlo associado no momento da conceção e preenche uma coleção de regiões estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml> method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml>método para gerar a marcação para a composição de tempo de criação do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml>

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml also populates `regions` with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: O GetDesignTimeHtml também preenche `regions` com um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>objeto para cada região clicável ou selecionável da composição do momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, a primeira célula em cada linha é selecionável; todas as células nas linhas são clicáveis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> to which definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control are added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref> são adicionadas as definições das regiões do seleccionável e clicáveis na vista de tempo de criação do controlo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém a marcação para compor o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref> no momento da concepção.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o conteúdo para uma região editável da vista de tempo de criação do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is currently not available.
trans-unit.target: Esta funcionalidade não está atualmente disponível.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> for which to fetch content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> para o qual pretende obter o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o estruturador para ver, editar e criar o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador chama o método de inicialização quando estiver pronto a utilizar o estruturador para compor o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A inicializar e respectivos métodos base configurar propriedades e configurar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo que está associado a este designer ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>, que implementa um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when a region of the design-time view of the associated control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a região da vista de tempo de criação do controlo associado é clicada.

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O método OnClick guarda o índice de região selecionada e atualiza a marcação que compõe a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo da superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"></xref> that defines the clicked region of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que define a região clicked do controlo.

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando altera o esquema da origem de dados para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o estruturador está no modo de edição do modelo ou um campo está a ser adicionado ou editado, as chamadas de método OnSchemaRefreshed o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>método, o que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo para refletir a alteração da origem de dados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizado pelo estruturador para remover propriedades de ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para apresentar no **propriedades** grelha ou às propriedades de sombra de volumes de controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers controlo utilizam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para funcionar como sombra várias propriedades de controlo com propriedades correspondentes do tempo de criação que implementa o estruturador, e para adicionar propriedades ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grelha.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the PreFilterProperties method sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> property to `false` when the control is in template mode.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlar, os conjuntos de método PreFilterProperties o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>objeto do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A>propriedade `false` quando o controlo está no modo de modelo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This is so a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the **Fields** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Isto é, para uma coluna que está no modo de modelo não pode ser eliminada utilizando o **campos** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementar uma coleção a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de linhas de exemplo para o controlo associado a apresentar.

trans-unit.source: If the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control allows paging and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property is greater than 0, the SampleRowCount property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> plus 1 (but not greater than 100).
trans-unit.target: Se o associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo permite paginação e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>propriedade é maior que 0, a propriedade SampleRowCount devolve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>plus 1 (mas não superior a 100).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> does not allow paging or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> is 0, SampleRowCount returns `5`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>não permite a paginação ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>for 0, SampleRowCount devolve `5`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The number of sample rows.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: Specifies content for an editable region of the design-time view for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o conteúdo para uma região editável da vista momento da conceção para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The SetEditableDesignerRegionContent method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O método de SetEditableDesignerRegionContent não tem nenhuma funcionalidade; não são suportadas para regiões editáveis na vista de tempo de criação do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> to update.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> para atualizar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> to write to `region`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>escrever `region`.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os campos do controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property constructs a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control template (pager and empty data) in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade TemplateGroups constrói um conjunto de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>objetos, um para cada campo de dados transformada em modelo e um para cada modelo de controlo (pager e dados em branco) na associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The data field <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements have a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object for each of the predefined row template types.
trans-unit.target: O campo de dados <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>os elementos de ter um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>objeto para cada um dos tipos de modelo de linha predefinido.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: The control template <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements contain a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de controlo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>elementos conter um único <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> containing an element for each templated field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> que contém um elemento para cada campo transformada em modelo no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o estruturador deve utilizar uma cópia temporária em vez de controlo real associado o estruturador para gerar a marcação de momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade UsePreviewControl é sempre `true`, utiliza o estruturador um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo que contém uma cópia do associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controlo para gerar a marcação de momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controlo não afeta quaisquer persistência para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para devolver `false`, o estruturador irá utilizar associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>automaticamente para gerar o momento da conceção markup e alterações de momento da conceção para o controlo vai manter a origem de marcação de página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>se deve utilizar o estruturador de uma cópia temporária em vez de controlo real associado o estruturador para gerar a marcação de tempo de criação; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
